titleStmt.title: The beggars bush written by Francis Beavmont and John Fletcher.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.
Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Robinson, and Anne Mosely ... ,

notesStmt.note: Beaumont's contribution to this is doubtful. Attributed to Fletcher and Massinger. Cf. Camb. hist. Eng. lit; Fleay, Biog. chron.; encyc. brit. 11th ed.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
